subject: Attention:
body:
Attention: 
How are you doing today? I am writing to know how far you have gone with our paying bank(Andy Halford (Mr).)  for transfer of your funds valued of $7,800,000.00 into your bank account.
Kindly get back to me.
Regards,
Barrister. Ken Morris.
WhatsApp: +17206490907

subject: Re:    Attention:
body:
Hello Barrister Ken Morris,

I'm doing well, thank you for asking. I hope you're having a good day too. 

Regarding the transfer of funds, I must admit that I'm a bit confused. Could you please provide more details about this? For instance, who is Andy Halford Mr and what is his role in this process? Also, could you clarify what these funds are for?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Melissa

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Many thanks for your email and I will like you to kindly resend me back my
previous email to you so that we can proceed.
Regards,
Barrister Ken Morris.
